---
title: "Installation instructions"
---

## R

For R, install from [here](https://cloud.r-project.org/index.html). For RStudio,
install from [here](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download).

## Git

For Git, install from [here](https://git-scm.com/downloads).

## Bash

Mac OSX and Linux users will already have bash installed. For Windows users, 
install the Windows version of Git above to install Git Bash.
